TITLE: Learning Playlists
DEF: Curated sequences of educational resources that guide learners through a topic or skill
TASK: Learning Playlists (LRNPL) are curated sequences of educational resources designed to guide learners through a topic or skill. They aim to provide a structured, coherent learning experience, addressing the challenge of navigating through vast amounts of information. Approaches include selecting high-quality resources, ordering them effectively, and tailoring them to learners' needs and goals.
